column2: "Na EWURADZE somaa Natan ma ɔkɔr David hɔ. Na ɔbaa ne nkyɛn
column3: na ɔbɛsee no dɛ
column4: Mbarimba beenu wɔ kurow kor mu; ɔbaako obirɛmpɔn a

column2: "Obirɛmpɔn no ɔwɔ nguan na anantwikuw dodoodow mbordo:"
"na ohianyi no dze
column3: onnyi hwee dɛ gyama eguambaaber kakraba kor a ɔtɔɔ no na ɔnyɛɛn no: na ɔnye ɔno
column4: na ɔnye ne mba bɔɔ mu nyinii; odzii nankasa no trɔma bi
column5: na ɔnoom nankasa no kɔɔpow ano

column2: "Na ɔhɔho bi baa obirɛmpɔn no ne nkyɛn no
column3: ɔammpɛ dɛ ɔfa nankasa no nguan
column4: na n’anantwi no bi siesie dze ma ɔkwantsennyi no a ɔbɔsoɛɛ no no
column5: na mbom ɔkɛfaa ohianyi no n’eguambaa no
column6: na ɔdze yɛɛ edziban maa ɔhɔho no a ɔbaa no hɔ no."

column2: "Na David n’ebufuw dzɛɛw kɛsenara wɔ obirɛmpɔn no do; na ɔsee Natan dɛ
column3: Dɛ EWURADZE tse ase yi
column4: ɔbarimba no a ɔayɛ iyi no fata dɛ owu."

column2: "Ɔnhyɛ eguambaa no ananmu mbɔho anan
column3: ɔnam dza ɔayɛ yi
column4: na ɔannkyerɛ tsimbɔbɔr ntsi."

column2: "Na Natan see David dɛ
column3: Ɔwoara nye obirɛmpɔn no. Mbrɛ EWURADZE
column4: Israel Nyankopɔn no
column6: Mara na meseraa wo mehyɛɛ wo ɔhen wɔ Israel do
column7: na Mara na megyee wo Saul nsamu;"

column2: "na medze wo wura Saul ne fi maa wo
column3: na medze ne yernom guu wo bo mu
column4: na medze Israel na Juda fi memaa wo; na sɛ osuar dodow a
column5: nkyɛ medze dɛm na dɛm so mebɛka wo ho."

column2: "Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na ebu EWURADZE n’asɛm enyimtsia
column3: na ereyɛ dza omuo wɔ n’enyi do yi? Ɔwo edze afona ekum Uria
column4: Hitinyi no
column5: na afa ne yer ayɛ wo yer
column6: na edze Ammonmba afona ekum no."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei
column3: afona rimmfi wo fie mmfir ara da; osiandɛ ebu me enyimtsia
column4: na afa Uria
column5: Hitinyi no ne yer ayɛ wo yer."

column2: "Mbrɛ EWURADZE se nye yi
column3: Hwɛ
column4: mebɛma mbusu efi wankasa wo fie asoɛr wo do
column5: na magye wo yernom wɔ w’enyim
column6: na medze hɔn ama wo nyɛnko
column7: na ɔnye wo yernom adeda wɔ w’enyim."

column2: "Na ɔwo yɛɛ no nsumaa mu: na emi dze
column3: mebɛyɛ adze yi wɔ Israel nyinara enyim
column4: na petee mu."

column2: "Na David see Natan dɛ
column3: Mayɛ bɔn etsia EWURADZE. Na Natan see David dɛ
column4: EWURADZE so ama wo bɔn etwa mu; innkowu."

column2: "Naaso
column3: dɛ edze wo ndzeyɛɛ yi ama EWURADZE n’atamfo enya ho kwan kɛse aka ebususɛm etsia no ntsi
column4: abofra no a wɔawo no ama wo no so owu ara na obowu."

column2: "Na Natan kɔr ne fie. Na EWURADZE bɔɔ abofra no a David nye Uria ne yer no woo no no
column3: ma ɔyaar dzendzenndzen."

column2: "Dɛm ntsi David paa Nyankopɔn kyɛw maa abofra no; na David dzii mbuada
column3: na ɔkɔr dan mu kɛdaa famu anadwe no nyinara."

column2: "Na ne fie mpanyimfo no soɛree
column3: na wokegyinaa no do
column4: dɛ wɔrema no do efi famu: na ɔammpen

column2: "Na ɔbaa dɛ da a otsia esuon no abofra no wui. Na David no nkowaa no suroo dɛ wɔbɛka akyerɛ no dɛ abofra no ewu: na wɔsee dɛ
column3: Hwɛ
column4: aber a abofra no da ho tse ase no
column6: naaso oenntsie hɛn ndze: na afei yɛbɛyɛ dɛn aka akyerɛ no dɛ abofra no ewu

column2: "Na aber a David hun dɛ no nkowaa no abɔ mu rowesawesa no
column3: David hun dɛ abofra no ewu: na David bisaa no nkowaa no dɛ
column4: Ana abofra no ewu a? Na wɔsee dɛ

column2: "Nna David soɛree fii famu
column3: na ɔhohoor noho
column4: na ɔserae
column5: na ɔsakyeer n’atar; na ɔkɔr EWURADZE ne fie
column6: na ɔkɔsɔree: na nkyii ɔbaa nankasa ne fie; na obisae no

column2: "Nna no nkowaa no see no dɛ
column3: Ebɛnadze na ayɛ yi? Ɔwo idzii mbuada na isui maa abofra no
column4: aber a ɔtse ase no; na mbom aber a abofra no wui no asoɛr na edzidzi."

column2: "Na ɔsee dɛ
column3: Aber a abofra no da ho tse ase no
column4: midzii mbuada na musui: na mesee dɛ
column5: Woana na onyim dɛ bi a EWURADZE bɔdom me ma abofra no atsena ase?"

column2: "Na afei dze oewu yi
column3: ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na monkɔ do mindzi mbuada? Ana mubotum medze no asan aba bio? Emi na mobɔkɔ ne nkyɛn
column4: na ɔnodze

column2: "Na David kyekyee ne yer Bat-seba no werɛ
column3: na ɔkɔr ne nkyɛn
column4: na ɔnye no hyiae; na ɔwoo babanyin
column5: na ɔtoo no dzin Solomon. Na EWURADZE dɔɔ no;"

column2: "na ɔdze nam nkɔnhyɛnyi Natan nsa do somae ma ɔkɔtoo no dzin Jedidia a asekyerɛ nye EWURADZE no dɔfo: wɔ EWURADZE ntsi."
"Afei Joab nye Ammonmba Rabaa koe
column3: na ɔgyee ahenkurow no."

column2: "Na Joab tuu abɔfo ma wɔkɔr David nkyɛn kɛsee dɛ
column3: Menye Rabaa ako
column4: nyew

column2: "Dɛm ntsi afei
column3: pon nkorɔfo nkaa no hyia
column4: na bɛkyer kurow no ho nsera na gye: ɔno bɛyɛ na magye kurow no na wɔdze me dzin ato no."

column2: "Nna David poon nkorɔfo no nyinara hyiae
column3: na osii mu kɔr Rabaa
column4: na ɔnye no kɔkoe

column2: "Na oyii hɔn hen n’ahenkyɛw no wɔ ne tsir; na no dur yɛ sika dwetsir kɛse
column3: na no mu wɔ aboɔdzen abo; na wɔdze hyɛɛ David ne tsir. Na ɔdze kurow no mu asadze piigyan mbordo puei bae."

column2: "Na ɔdze nkorɔfo a wɔwɔ mu no puei bae
column3: na ɔdze hɔn kɛhyɛɛ nseradaa
column4: na dadze dɛtse porowdze
column6: na ɔmaa wokoduaa ntayaa fononoo mu: na mbrɛ ɔdze yɛɛ Ammonmba nkurow no nyinara nye no. Na David na ɔman no nyinara sanee baa Jerusalɛm."
